title: Best of the Program | Guest: Chris Bedford | 3/16/22
description:
Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy addressed a joint session of Congress asking for help in fighting back against Russia. Glenn goes into the dangers of a programmable dollar that’s tied to your name and your inevitable ESG score. Senior editor for the Federalist Chris Bedford joins to discuss his latest article, “Two Years After Lockdowns, the West’s Troubles Aren’t Ending — They’re Just Beginning” and the political disconnect in society.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
